General.Name: Zhejiang Netsun Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang NetSun Co., Ltd. provides Internet information, e-commerce, professional search engines, and enterprise application software development services in China. The company owns and operates professional Websites, such as chinachemnet.com, globalchemnet.com, chinatextilenet.com, and medicinenet.com. Zhejiang NetSun Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Yue Long  Fan
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
